page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In our area people go to work in Bracknell. Most people travel to work by car because it is faster than the bus. The most popular job was to make computers, radars and other electrical goods. Most people who are employed work full time and work from six to ten hours each day. Most people's companies are linked up by a computer. The most anybody has been in a job was for thirty years. Some people would be prepared to go to Wales to get a job whereas 7% of the male population are unemployed. The farthest away anybody we interviewed worked was 31.25 miles away. Only a few people have children that are employed. There are a lot of shopkeepers in Binfield. Not many people do shift work. 60% of women interviewed have a part time job mainly in the local area.
